mainboard.name: Brainsurge
mainboard.oracle_text: Draw four cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

mainboard.name: Fact or Fiction
mainboard.oracle_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
